param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the desired width, the height is automatically determined.

param.name: thermo_max
param.label: Thermometer Max Value
param.description: The integer value of the top of the thermometer E.g. 10000

param.name: scale_markers
param.label: Thermometer Scale Markers
param.description: Comma-seperated list of currency values to display on the thermometer's scale. E.g. 1000|5000|10000

param.name: fundraising_goal
param.label: Fundraising Goal
param.description: Show your fundraising goal and progress

param.name: recent_donations
param.label: Show X Recent Donations
param.description: Show the dollar amounts of the last X donations
